resources.string: This app is very simple to use. To randomly generate a Chuck Norris joke, press Generate Joke on the home screen. To search for a joke with a specific topic, select the Search Joke option on the toolbar. To add any joke to your list of favorites, simply click on the plus sign on the toolbar. To display all of your favorites click on the Favorites toolbar option. From this screen, you can delete a specific joke by clicking on it and then clicking Delete Joke, or delete all the jokes in your favorites by clicking Delete All. If you want to change the theme of the app or font style, simply click on the Settings toolbar option. Lastly, if you want to share a joke with a friend, you can click the Share toolbar option while the joke is displayed. You can also share jokes from your favorites. Enjoy!
This app was design and implemented by Kyle Horton for a Quinnipiac University Software Engineering course. The REST-API was created by ChuckNorris.io
